Key Match Events: Tommy Pham hit a three-run home run in the fourth inning, breaking a 1-1 tie and leading the Royals to a 4-1 win
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the final game of a three-game series between the Guardians and Royals, with the Guardians winning the series 2-1
Others: The game was played at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Missouri, and was broadcast on FS1
